resources.string:
There's a couple things we need to cover before the app will be ready for use: 
 
1) Link your device to Hermes, the Discord bot that you send messages through. 
2) How to use Hermes to read/reply to your messages.

You will receive a 10 character string at the end of this introduction. 
If you have Tron added as a friend or on your server, send a PM like so and you'll be ready: 

+initiate <random string>


 If you're successful, you should see something like this:
If not, you\'ll see something like this:
The above text is your activation token. \nSend it to Tron and when you receive the success message, press complete.
